meanings.sent1: The complex math problem boggles my mind.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected turn of events boggles the audience.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog boggles my imagination.
meanings.sent4: The speed of the cheetah boggles the mind.
meanings.sent5: The vastness of the universe boggles our understanding.

meanings.definition: To cause to be astonished or perplexed
meanings.sent1: Her magic trick boggles the children at the party.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious disappearance of the key boggles everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to open doors boggles my logic.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset boggles the senses.
meanings.sent5: The complexity of the human brain boggles scientists.
